# {.tabset} 

## Ownership Rate

### {.tabset}

#### Count

```{r ownershiprate count}

orc_re <- create_plots("ownership-rate", 1, "count")

orc_re_hhsize <- create_plots("ownership-rate", 2, "count")

iwalk(orc_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(orc_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```

#### Shares

```{r ownershiprate share}

ors_re <- create_plots("ownership-rate", 1, "share")

ors_re_hhsize <- create_plots("ownership-rate", 2, "share")

iwalk(ors_re$plots, ~print(.x))

iwalk(ors_re_hhsize$plots, ~print(.x))

```
